description: Les Récoltants is a unique initiative founded by three partners, focusing on a direct-from-producer restaurant model. Located in Bordeaux, it emphasizes seasonal, organic produce sourced from local farms. The project aims to enhance food traceability and sustainability by adapting menus based on available ingredients, fostering a close relationship with producers. By eliminating intermediaries, Les Récoltants supports local agriculture while offering customers fresh, diverse culinary experiences that celebrate regional flavors and biodiversity.
name: Les Récoltants
